articles.title: LeBron James becomes part owner of Boston Red Sox, joins Fenway Sports Group as partner - ESPN Australia
articles.description: LeBron James is becoming a partner in Fenway Sports Group, making the NBA superstar a part owner of the Boston Red Sox.
